oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Alfred Middleton to his father
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Middleton was from McMinn County, Tenn., and served in Co. H, 19th Tenn. Inf. He was under Gen. Felix Zollicoffer's command and was killed a few weeks after writing this letter to his father at the Battle of Mill Springs on January 19, 1862. He describes "building boats now to cross the river" and speaks of being "encamped here with seven regiments of infantry and eleven companies of cavalry and two regiments of infantry on the way here."
